metadataFields.name: Study Title
metadataFields.description: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled clinical trial for evaluating XYZ drug.

metadataFields.name: Protocol Number
metadataFields.description: Protocol ID used to uniquely identify this study in regulatory systems.

metadataFields.name: Version Number
metadataFields.description: Document version to track protocol amendments.

metadataFields.name: Date of Protocol Version
metadataFields.description: The official date of the current protocol version.

metadataFields.name: Sponsor Name
metadataFields.description: The organization or entity sponsoring the clinical trial

metadataFields.name: IND/CTA Number (if applicable)
metadataFields.description: Investigational New Drug or Clinical Trial Application identifier

metadataFields.name: Study Acronym / Short Title
metadataFields.description: Abbreviated name used internally or in publications.

metadataFields.name: Confidentiality Statement (Yes/No)
metadataFields.description: Indicates whether the document contains confidential content

metadataFields.name: Study Phase (I, II, III, IV)
metadataFields.description: The clinical phase of drug development this study belongs to.

metadataFields.name: Study Type (Interventional, Observational, Registry)
metadataFields.description: Classification of the clinical study design

metadataFields.name: Study Design Description (Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, etc.)
metadataFields.description: A structured outline of the trial methodology as described in the protocol

metadataFields.name: Number of Arms / Treatment Groups
metadataFields.description: Total number of intervention groups in the trial

metadataFields.name: Control Group Type (Placebo, Active Comparator, etc.)
metadataFields.description: Nature of the comparison group in the study

metadataFields.name: Blinding / Masking (Open-label, Single-blind, Double-blind)
metadataFields.description: The extent to which study participants and investigators are blinded to treatment assignment

metadataFields.name: Randomization (Yes/No)
metadataFields.description: Indicates if study participants were randomly assigned.

metadataFields.name: Age Range
metadataFields.description: Minimum and maximum age criteria for study participation

metadataFields.name: Sex/Gender
metadataFields.description: Gender-based eligibility for study participants

metadataFields.name: Geographic Region
metadataFields.description: The global region(s) where the trial is being conducted

metadataFields.name: Country of Conduct
metadataFields.description: Specific country where the study is approved to run.

metadataFields.name: Inclusion Criteria (list or reference section)
metadataFields.description: Eligibility criteria that participants must meet to enroll in the study

metadataFields.name: Exclusion Criteria (list or reference section)
metadataFields.description: Conditions or factors that disqualify potential participants from the study.

metadataFields.name: Dose Level(s)
metadataFields.description: Prescribed dosage or treatment level used in the study

metadataFields.name: Route of Administration
metadataFields.description: he method by which the drug is administered (e.g., oral, IV)
